title: Manohari Emerald & Diamond Mango Mala Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) simulating brilliant-cut diamonds. Expertly crafted setting to showcase the gemstones.
features: Classic Mango (Paisley) motif design, meticulously arranged and intricately detailed. The layout alternates between the mango design and intricate floral designs. Features a large, elaborate pendant with matching emerald and CZ design. The use of CZ simulates the allure of polki diamonds, giving a rich and luxurious appearance.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Its elegant design also lends itself to high-end parties and formal events.
description: A masterpiece of traditional South Indian craftsmanship, blending heritage with modern aesthetics. The Mango (Paisley) design symbolizes prosperity and fertility. The vibrant emeralds are believed to bring good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and durability. This haaram is a timeless heirloom, designed to be treasured for generations.
